text_description:
Located in Kintzheim, 9.1 km from Le Haut Koenigsbourg Castle, Hotel Au Parc des Cigognes provides accommodation with a terrace, free private parking, a restaurant and a bar. This 2-star hotel offers free WiFi. The property is non-smoking and is situated 22 km from Colmar Expo.

Guest rooms in the hotel are equipped with a flat-screen TV.

Hotel Au Parc des Cigognes offers a buffet or continental breakfast.

House of the Heads is 25 km from the accommodation, while Saint-Martin Collegiate Church is 25 km away. Strasbourg International Airport is 41 km from the property.

hotel_name: Résidence Odalys Le Domaine des Rois
text_description:
Résidence Odalys Le Domaine des Rois is located 200 metres from the historic centre of Bergheim and offers a heated indoor swimming pool, a fitness room and free parking.

Résidence Odalys Le Domaine des Rois features fully furnished, ready-to-live-in apartments complete with optional hotel services. The apartments are equipped with a kitchenette, including a hotplate and a microwave.

The residence’s convenient location makes it easy to discover the Alsace Wine Route. Bergheim is only 16 kilometres from Colmar and 11 kilometres from Sélestat.
address: Rue Du Faubourg St Pierre, 68750 Bergheim, France

hotel_name: The Originals Boutique, Hôtel La Ferme du Pape, Eguisheim
text_description:
The Originals Boutique, Hôtel La Ferme du Pape, Eguisheim is located at the gate of a charming village, in the heart of vineyards and a gourmet region. The hotel is situated 8 km from Colmar.

Rooms at the The Originals Boutique, Hôtel La Ferme du Pape, Eguisheim feature traditional decor and are equipped with modern amenities such as free WiFi  access.

The The Originals Boutique, Hôtel La Ferme du Pape, Eguisheim offers a shaded terrace where you can savour local specialities accompanied with wines from the region.

The hotel features a lift, free private parking and facilities for the disabled. The golf course and the tennis courts are 5 km from the hotel and the town swimming pool is 6 km away.

This hotel is located 200 metres from the city centre of Eguisheim, a 10-minute drive from Colmar. It offers free Wi-Fi internet access and free private parking.

The rooms at the Hotel Colmar Vignes Eguisheim are also equipped with TVs and some have private balconies.

Guests can enjoy a daily buffet breakfast.

The Alsace wine route and the Vosges Mountains are easily accessible from Hotel Colmar Vignes Eguisheim.
address: 2 rue des Trois Châteaux, 68420 Eguisheim, France

text_description:
Colmar Hotel is located in Colmar, 1 km from House of the Heads. Colmar Christmas Market - Place des Dominicains is 1.2 km away. It features free WiFi, a 24-hour reception, a bar and a free private parking in front of the hotel.

Every room is equipped with a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, a kettle and a private bathroom. Free toiletries and a hair dryer are available in all of the rooms.

Free parking and paid secured parking are available on site. Saint-Martin Collegiate Church is 1.1 km from Colmar Hotel, while Colmar Expo is 3.5 km away. The nearest airport is Euro Basel-Mulhouse-Freiburg Airport, 54 km from the property.

Boasting an ideal location on the Wine Route, Hotel Le Mittelwihr offers a warm and friendly welcome in a building with a stunning design surrounded by a natural environment.

Hotel Le Mittelwihr features comfortable rooms with a decoration combining traditional style and modern facilities. Each room is air-conditioned and is a cosy backdrop for your stay in Alsace. Free WiFi is provided throughout the property.

In the morning, savour a delicious breakfast in the typical-style breakfast room or on the terrace.

For your relaxation, a sauna, a solarium and massages are available at the Mandelberg Hotel 200 metres from the hotel.

hotel_name: Hotel SPA Husseren Collections - Proche Colmar - Eguisheim
text_description:
The hotel, with terraces southerly oriented, is located between vineyards and forest, at the foothills of the ruins of the three castles in the heart of Alsace, on the wine-road, 6 km from Colmar, 70 km from Strasbourg.

The establishment boasts a bistronomic restaurant, "Bain de Forêt", with a terrace featuring forest views. Guests can also enjoy an indoor swimming pool, a sauna, and bright seminar rooms with professional material and Wi-Fi access.

Staff at the Hotel Restaurant & Spa Husseren Collections speak English, German, Danish and Italian. Nine charging stations (including 3 tesla) for electric cars are available at this property.

Parking is available and for free.

hotel_name: Résidence Pierre & Vacances Le Clos d'Eguisheim
text_description:
Résidence Pierre & Vacances Le Clos D'Eguisheim is located 700 metres from Eguisheim village centre, in the Alsace region along the Alsace Wine Route. It offers a heated, indoor swimming pool and fully equipped apartments.

Each apartment is fully furnished with a terrace or loggia with garden furniture, a separate living area and a private bathroom. The kitchens include a vitroceramic cooking hob, fridge and coffee maker. WiFi access is available for a fee. A bakery services is available at a surcharge.

The Résidence Pierre & Vacances overlooks the Three Keeps Hill. It is located just 6.5 km from Colmar city centre and 30 km from the German border. Private parking is available at an extra cost and guests can rent books and board games free of charge.

Green Key-awarded.

Situated in the heart of a vineyard in Heiligenstein, this hotel features a garden, terrace and offers free Wi-Fi. A wide choice of wines is available for guests to taste.

Each room is equipped with a flat-screen TV with satellite channels and an en suite bathroom. Rooms are simple in style and some have a balcony and garden view.

A buffet breakfast is available every morning at Relais du Klevener. For other meals the restaurant on site proposes traditional French cuisine.

The Relais du Klevener is on the Wine Route, 28 minutes by car from Strasbourg and its train station and airport. Free private parking is available.

Hotel Dontenville is located in the heart of Chatenois, in the Alsace region. It offers free Wi-Fi access and rooms with a traditional décor and wooden beams.

Each guest room at the Dontenville Hotel has a private bathroom with a shower. They are equipped with a TV and a telephone.

Dontenville’s restaurant serves a continental breakfast and regional cuisine. Guests can relax in the lounge bar or on the private terrace.

Dontenville is just 4 km from Selestat Train Station and a 30-minute drive from Strasbourg Airport.
address: 94 rue du Mal Foch, 67730 Châtenois, France

text_description:
Located in the village of Eguisheim in the Alsace region, this hotel features modern rooms with private bathroom and a traditional restaurant. Free WiFi is available in the entire hotel.

The soundproofed rooms at Hôtel L'Auberge Alsacienne include a flat-screen TV with satellite channels. Hairdryer and free bathroom toiletries are also provided.

A buffet breakfast is served every morning in the dining room. The hotel’s restaurant offers typical Alsatian food with à la carte menus.

Eguisheim centre is only 300 metres away and Colmar SNCF Train Station is 6 km from the property. German frontier is very close and Freiburg is 1 hour’s drive.

Hotel De La Courronne is located in Riquewihr town centre, 14km north of Colmar. This family-run hotel offers spacious accommodation with en-suite facilities and free Wi-Fi internet access.

Accessible by stairs, all rooms feature original oak beams and medieval furnishings. Each room has a TV and a private bathroom with a hairdryer.

A continental breakfast is served daily at the hotel's breakfast room at an extra cost. Guests can also relax in the café bar and on the terrace.

A large private carpark is available on site and Hotel De La Couronne provides an express check-in service and a multilingual staff. The picturesque town of Ribeauvillé is just 5km away. Two recharge stations for electric cars are available for a fee.
address: 5 rue de la Couronne, 68340 Riquewihr, France

text_description:
Hotel Primo Colmar Centre is located at the centre of Colmar, just 300 metres from the Unterlinden Museum and the Christmas market, and 5 minutes' drive from Colmar Expo and the Bartholdi's Statue of Liberty. It offers free WiFi access.

The contemporary rooms feature a private bathroom and a TV.

A breakfast buffet is served daily at the Hotel Primo Colmar Centre. The hotel also provides a 24-hour reception.

Public parking is available in front of the Hotel Primo Colmar Centre at an extra cost. It is just 1.7 km from Colmar Train Station. You can also travel the 15-minute drive to the famous vineyards on the Alsace Wine Route.

hotel_name: Best Western Hotel & SPA Le Schoenenbourg - Riquewihr - Proche Colmar
text_description:
Surrounded by vineyards, the Best Western Hotel Le Schoenenbourg is opposite the ramparts of the medieval village of Riquewihr. This eco-friendly hotel features a complimentary spa area with an indoor pool, saunas and hammam as well as a seasonal outdoor pool. Riquewihr Christmas Market is 170 meters away.

Each room is decorated in neutral colours. The air-conditioned rooms are equipped with free WiFi access, a flat-screen TV with satellite channels and tea and coffee making facilities. Please note that the restaurant is open.

Additional facilities at the Best Western include a bar. Guests can enjoy a daily buffet breakfast in the dining area or on the outdoor terrace overlooking the garden.

Hotel Le Schoenenbourg is 13 km from Colmar, 28 km from the border of Germany and 53 minutes from Strasbourg. Guests can go hiking in the Réserve Naturelle du Massif du Ventron.
address: 2A, rue de la piscine, 68340 Riquewihr, France

text_description:
Set on the Alsace Wine Route, the Ibis Budget Sélestat is located in Sélestat. Free WiFi access is available. You can relax on the furnished terrace.

The air-conditioned rooms are provided with a flat-screen TV, a desk and a private bathroom with free toiletries.

Breakfast is served each morning in the communal lounge with an additional cost.

Other facilities offered at the property include a vending machine. The property offers free private parking on site and Colmar is 17 km away. The hotel is just 17 km from the German border and the A35 Highway Exit is 1.9 km away.

We offer a small restaurant at the reception.

Reception is open 24/7.

Hotel De La Tour is in a former winery in Ribeauvillé’s medieval centre. Guests have free access to the sauna, hammam, hot tub. Free WiFi and bike rental are also available.

Rooms at Hotel De La Tour are individually decorated and equipped with a telephone, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a shower or a bath. Some rooms feature details of the original Alsatian building.

De La Tour Hotel is near several restaurants that serve traditional Alsatian dishes including sauerkraut, baeckaoffa and tartes flambées. The hotel has a bar and lounge where guests can relax with an aperitif.

There is also a tennis court and guests receive preferential rates at the nearby Ammerschwihr and Alsace Golf Clubs. The Tour des Bouchers is opposite this hotel. Ribeauvillé Train Station is a 4.3 km from the hotel and Colmar is 16 km away.
address: 1, rue de La Mairie, 68150 Ribeauvillé, France

text_description:
Featuring free WiFi and a restaurant, Châtenois, 2.2 km from Monkey Mountain and 3 km from Cigoland Attraction Park.

The rooms include a flat-screen TV, a kettle and a private bathroom with fee toiletries and a hairdryer.

A selection of activities are offered in the area, such as horse riding and cycling. Strasbourg International Airport is 35 km from the property.

The Berceau Du Vigneron is located in the heart of the Alsace vineyard 7 kilometres west of Colmar. Guests can relax in the hotel’s bar with a free newspaper. Free WiFi access is available throughout the hotel.

All rooms at the property are decorated with wooden furniture and feature a private bathroom and a flat-screen TV.

From May to October, guests can participate in nighttime tours of the city.

The Berceau du Vigneron is located near several vineyards on the Alsatian Wine Route, where guests can sample the regional produce. The hotel is just 15 minutes from Colmar town centre and Colmar-Houssen Airport.

Located on the Alsace Wine Route, Hotel Kieffer offers rooms with free Wi-Fi access and a flat-screen TV. It is possible to arrange wine-tasting with the owner.

Each room includes a private bathroom with a bath or shower and free toiletries. Some rooms also have a balcony or terrace. A continental breakfast is available daily for a supplement of EUR 14 per person.

Free private parking is possible on site at the Hotel Kieffer. The property is 35 km from Strasbourg and Haut Koenigsbourg Castle is 20 km away.

This family-run hotel is situated in the medieval town of Riquewihr, in the heart of the Alsatian vineyards. It has an indoor pool, sauna and secure parking.

The rooms and suites include free Wi-Fi internet access and air conditioning.  Some rooms have a balcony with views of the surrounding countryside.

Hotel Le Riquewihr serves a daily buffet breakfast in the dining area, which can also be taken in the guest room upon request.  Guests can relax with a drink in the bar or on the terrace.

In addition to the indoor swimming pool, guests have access to a fitness centre and a range of massages.

Free private parking is available for guests exploring the Alsace Wine Route by car.  Colmar is 25 km from Le Riquewihr Hotel.

Hotel Arc-En-Ciel Colmar Contact Hotel is situated in a verdant setting just 1 km from the city centre of Colmar and its historical sites and attractions.

All of the standard guest rooms feature modern en suite facilities, TV and free optic fibre WiFi internet access. There are also connecting rooms.

This hotel is a great starting point for discovering La Route des Vins, the local picturesque villages and leisure parks. Not to mention the regional cuisine and local wine.

The hotel also offers a free private car park, a garage for bicycles, an outdoor terrace, and veranda where guests can enjoy breakfast or a moment of quiet.

Hotel Elisabeth has a garden, terrace, a restaurant and bar in La Vancelle. The property is situated 30 km from Colmar Expo, 33 km from House of the Heads and 34 km from Saint-Martin Collegiate Church. The property is non-smoking and is set 12 km from Le Haut Koenigsbourg Castle.

At the hotel, all rooms include a wardrobe. At Hotel Elisabeth all rooms have a balcony, a private bathroom and a flat-screen TV.

The accommodation offers a buffet or continental breakfast.

Colmar Train Station is 38 km from Hotel Elisabeth, while Würth Museum is 38 km from the property. Strasbourg International Airport is 50 km away.
address: 5 rue de Gaulle, 67730 La Vancelle, France

text_description:
Featuring free, high-speed WiFi throughout the property, B&B Hôtel Colmar offers pet-friendly accommodation in Wintzenheim, 5 minutes' drive from Colmar. Free private parking is available on site.

Each air-conditioned room is equipped with a flat-screen TV with satellite and beIN sport channels. Rooms are fitted with a private bathroom fitted with a shower.

A continental breakfast with fresh bread with Nutella or jam is served every morning at a surcharge. Guests can also sample eggs and bacon on site.

Freiburg im Breisgau is 41 km from B&B Hôtel Colmar, while Gérardmer is 32 km away. Euro Basel-Mulhouse-Freiburg Airport is 56 km from the property.

Set within 19 km of Colmar Expo and 22 km of House of the Heads, B&B HOTEL Sélestat Centre-Alsace provides rooms in Sélestat. With a bar, the 3-star hotel has air-conditioned rooms with free WiFi, each with a private bathroom. The property is non-smoking and is located 12 km from Le Haut Koenigsbourg Castle.

At the hotel, each room comes with a desk and a flat-screen TV. Guest rooms include a wardrobe.

Buffet and continental breakfast options are available daily at B&B HOTEL Sélestat Centre-Alsace.

Speaking English and French, staff will be happy to provide guests with practical guidance on the area at the reception.

Saint-Martin Collegiate Church is 22 km from the accommodation, while Colmar Train Station is 26 km away. Strasbourg International Airport is 41 km from the property.

hotel_name: Résidence Les Rives de la Fecht - Colmar Ouest
text_description:
Located at the beginning of the Alsace Wine Route, this residence is set in a small forest with views of the Vosges Mountains. Free WiFi is available throughout. Riquewihr and Colmar Exhibition Centre are a 10-minute drive away.

The apartments and studios at Résidence Les Rives de la Fetch have a seating area with an LCD TV. Bed linen and towels are provided once and free of charge.

Meals can be prepared in your accommodation’s kitchenette, which is equipped with an oven and hotplates. Alternatively the residence offers a buffet breakfast and also has a restaurant, Aux Berges de la Fecht.

Massage treatments can be arranged at the property. Free private parking is available on site. Other local villages include Kaysersberg and Ribeauvillé, both less than a 15-minute drive away.
address: 18 quai de la Fecht, 68040 Ingersheim, France
